title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing a 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3, an unexpected behavior occurs. Selecting xxx as the destination for the copy operation leads to the creation of a package named 'ui' in the destination.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' operation with xxx as the destination, a package named 'ui' is created in the destination.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. 
2. Initiate the 'copy package' operation. 
3. Select xxx as the destination. 
4. Follow the steps to complete the 'copy package' operation. 
5. Observe that a package named 'ui' is created in the destination.
